name: THClient
desc: A class that supports safely sharing Thread credentials between multiple clients.

items.name: func retrieveAllCredentials((Set<THCredentials>?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests all Thread credentials from the framework.

items.name: func retrieveCredentials(forBorderAgent: Data, completion: (THCredentials?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests Thread credentials for a Border Agent.

items.name: func retrieveCredentials(forExtendedPANID: Data, completion: (THCredentials?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests Thread credentials for an extended Personal Area Network (PAN) ID.

items.name: func retrievePreferredCredentials((THCredentials?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests Thread credentials for the preferred network.

items.name: func deleteCredentials(forBorderAgent: Data, completion: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Deletes Thread network credentials from the framework database for a Border Agent.

items.name: func storeCredentials(forBorderAgent: Data, activeOperationalDataSet: Data, completion: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Stores Thread network credentials into the framework database that a Border Agent provides.
